wikipedia_page.main: Robert Laurence Metcalf (18 November 1935 - 26 December 2014) was an Anglican priest and author.Metcalf was educated at Durham University. After National Service with REME he was ordained in  1963. He served curacies in Bootle and Widnes; and incumbencies in Wigan and Wavertree. He was Archdeacon of Liverpool from 1994 until 2002.

response: Robert Metcalfe (1579–1652) was an English priest and Regius Professor of Hebrew at the University of Cambridge.

link_mentions.page: Archdeacons in the Diocese of Liverpool

response: Robert Metcalfe or Robert Metcalf may refer to:
* Robert Metcalfe, American engineer and entrepreneur
* Robert Metcalfe (Hebraist), English priest and professor of Hebrew
* Robert Metcalf, English priest and archdeacon of Liverpool
